price: Na tungeli taka tunge wageuza sura hapo hapo walipo, basi wasinge weza kwenda wala kurudi.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمۡ فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مُضِيّٗا وَلَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: Na lau tungeli taka kuzigeuza sura zao tungeli zigeuza zikawa mbaya, juu ya kuwa wana nguvu na vyeo. Hata wasinge weza kwenda mbele wala kurudi nyuma, kwa kuwa inge kuwa tumevunja nguvu zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lamasakhnāhum ʿalā makānatihim famā is'taṭāʿū muḍiyyan walā yarjiʿūna
